website_summaries.verdict: An epilator of superior craftsmanship from a reputable company.
pros: Ergonomically designed for comfort in the hand
Head is angled for extremely easy hair removal
cons: Some reports of ingrown hairs after using this model

customer_reviews.title: FALSE WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT purchase this product. After a few short months (July-October) my epilator head locked up and would no longer work. THE ATTACHMENTS do not fall under the 2 year warranty!! Panasonic REFUSED to help me with anything because the attachments are not part of the two year warranty. I will no longer purchase or support any Panasonic devices whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Burke

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine at first, useless after ten months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January 2017 and used two - three times a week (writing this in October 2017). By midsummer I had to start "supplementing" with pulling with a tweezers. By now, it is really not working at all anymore. I took care to follow the instructions regarding cleaning, charging, and storing.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, not so great 2 months later
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first two months, Now it barely works at all , won’t hold a charge. A lot of money to waste for it to only work for a couple months. Now I have a $100 epilator that doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: TKay

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: I had higher hopes for an expensive name brand epilator. Used about 3 times, then died. It lights up like it’s charging, but the motor is dead. The times I did use it it hurts, but got the hair out and I’m never going back to not epilating again. My mom has an epilator that has lasted her 20+ years, so I know the technology is out there, Panasonic just hasn’t put it in this device.
customer_reviews.author: ANNA BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Plastic skin protector on top pops off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gold because it was the cheaper option. It’s actually really pretty in person. I had an older version of this epilator several years ago. I only used this once, and remembered why I switched brands with my last epilator—- the plastic skin protector falls off while using it. I snap it back in. It falls off. So I taped it on. Once secured, it did a great job removing hair. It’s just a pain in the butt cleaning once the top is taped on. If this didn’t do such a good job removing hair, it would have been returned because of the top snapping off.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Yikes, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been epilating for about three years now. I'm upset that I upgraded to an $80 epilator when my $20 drug store Remington one works better (. I epilate only my legs and underarms. I have to re-do the same section of skin way more times than the Remington, and there was absolutely no decrease in pain. If you're going to epilate your bikini area, maybe buy this product, but for legs and underarms only feel free to get a simpler option.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Smoother than ever
customer_reviews.text: I have to face facts. I'm a hairy bastard. Seriously, if I'm undressed it looks like someone shoved a broom up my wazoo. Well, with this handy little gadget, those days are long gone. No more embarrassment over my hirsutivity. For the mere pittance of HOURS OF EXTREME PAIN, my skin is probably even more smooth than it was on the day I shot out of my mam's vajay. Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: visacrum

customer_reviews.title: Just don't bother - and expect 0 help from Panasonic when it breaks (and it will)
customer_reviews.text: There's a tiny little plastic cog that is responsible for cranking the turn of the epilator heads - which is connected to another flimsy piece of plastic. The pieces don't align well together, so for about a month (or just enough time to not be able to return it through Amazon), the pieces will turn and the head will work (albeit with a screech). Then it will stop working, and best of luck dealing with Panasonic to fix - they won't. First it'll take a month to get customer service to respond - with the only advice being to enter their chat function. Apparently the next steps are to send it in so they may "review" the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cullenao

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: This epilator is terrible. It grabs your skin every time you use it and pinches. I have a much cheaper epilady version that has never pinched my skin. I bought it because the ratings were good but now I wish that I wouldn’t have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, seems a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. It doesn't last long on a charge, usually maybe one full use of doing your legs. I dont use any of the additional head covers and actually use it without one at all as it seems to get closer to the hair. The little brush to clean the head doesn't work super well and you have to be careful to spend a little longer cleaning with a stiffer brush/water to get everything out. The head itself does seem a little flimsy after using it a few times... like it's a little wobbly side to side? Overall it does the job and I am satisfied with the purchase, but would purchase a different brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: I love using this!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this! The first time I used it was easy, legs went smoothly with barely a sting. Underarms, however, were angry with me for several days... hurt like crazy the first time I ripped out a full pit bush. Pro tip - keep up with it every few days to avoid having to go through that pain again. Same with moustache, although that never really stops being painful. Works AMAZING though, everything stays super smooth!
customer_reviews.author: CMT

customer_reviews.title: Had never epilated before so was expecting it to be really painful, but it was not at all
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about 2 weeks and it’s working perfectly so far. Had never epilated before so was expecting it to be really painful, but it was not at all. I do have rather sparse leg hairs and a lot of them are quite thin so that could be why. Definitely not going to use on my underarm because that is way too tender (I tried it for like a second!) I love that it has a light on it, makes it easy to spot those little overlooked hairs. Hoping this will save me some money on razors!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after a few months :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in October 2018 and have been using it once every two weeks only on the underarms. Today, one of the tweezers snapped out of place on its own, disrupting the whole rotation mechanism. The epilator no longer works as a consequence. For the amount of money I paid for this, I expected it to last much more than a few months! The previous one I had worked for 5+ years and I only stopped using it because I need a cordless alternative. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Luane Gauer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not know it’s exist. I epilate my body many years but never been so quick, easy and painless. Of course you feel this an epilator but compare whit older version... I highly recommend and I am very happy my old epilator broken Because I never buy and know how big the difference between the newest and oldest ! My favorite point on the whole story It is save me time, money!
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: WAY less messy than wax, slightly more painful
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I use it on my arms, underarms and legs and have hair that varies from superfine invisible to medium-thick dark. I’m fair-skinned and while I have a high pain tolerance, I do have sensitive skin. Pain-wise I’d say it’s more than a bikini wax, less than labor. I can carry on a polite conversation while using it, but it would kill the mood to use it right after a long relaxing bath. It’s nowhere near as painful as cleaning up a bunch of spilled wax or peeling muslin strips off a cat who likes to dumpster dive, though, so it’s my new favorite hair removal tool!
customer_reviews.author: Lauryl A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: But weirdly it gets less painful the more you use it
customer_reviews.text: Yes it hurts. But weirdly it gets less painful the more you use it. Don't kid yourself, it will never feel like a relaxing massage - you are yanking hair out by the root. Yet after 3, 4, 5 times it no longer feels like hundreds of fire ants biting your legs. It's more of a annoying buzz. If you can't wait the 4-6 weeks to wax, get this. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Sherl

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Epilator hurts but is better in water with soap. About two weeks after epilating I developed many ingrown hairs. I mostly use the shaving attachment. It works just fine. The pedicure tool works okay. If I had it to do over again, I may have bought a better model, although I don't entirely regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JPax

customer_reviews.title: it's alright, wished it was even better
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay epilator. It definitely removes lots of hairs but there is always that feeling of tiny thin hairs left when I'm done, no matter how many times I go over the same area. Wish it was more thorough. I love that there are different heads to apply to the motor, especially the electric shaver is a nice plus. It's very easy to operate and you can get a lot of use out of just one charge. I also like that you can use it on wet skin in the shower or on dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kokus LLC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth investment
customer_reviews.text: Broke entirely too soon I purchased this item on March 2019 I have only used it once a month so therefore only used it a total of 7 times and when I attempted to use it this month for the 8th time the epilator head would not pick up any hair it started skipping and pinching my skin the minute I put even an ounce of pressure. I am extremely upset I spent 89 bucks on this given that it hasn’t even lasted a year
customer_reviews.author: Pearla A.

customer_reviews.title: Best option for the price with the most features.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and this was the best option. Works great and is easy to use. I've purchased another one for my daughter. Highly recommend this product! Update review: Have owned for 2 years and still love this product. The pedicure buffer works like a pro. I've used it carefully to smooth a nail that has a bump in it making for a nicer pedi. Love the shaver attachment too. Only negative I've found is there isn't a way to purchase a replacement shaver head. Still give it 5 stars after two years.
customer_reviews.author: MaryRinKC

customer_reviews.title: Use the small elpi head on pits
customer_reviews.text: This has been working for me for 5 years.... One of the best birthday gifts my husband ever gave me. I use all the heads they are awesome. I was tempted many times to use the large head on my armpits to save time... But always ends in a rash. Only use the small elpi head on the pits or bikini line. A bunch saved on razors or wax. Suck it up. This is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tedious
customer_reviews.text: Requires a lot of time to use, painful, doesn't get all hairs, causes ingrown hairs and some rashes. Head of machine started making a lot of noise and not working as well after only 3 months of use. We have not yet tried to use warranty, but will update to let you know how the company is to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like this one.
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a cheap 20 dollar epilator and hoped this one would be miles better, it wasn't. I really liked the waterproof and cordless features but this epilator kept breaking the hairs instead of pulling them out. It has twice as many tweezer heads as my cheap one, but somehow took twice as long to remove the same amount of hair. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bubble

customer_reviews.title: Quality has become cheap and defected.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this item and after one time use one of the blades stopped rotating and the plastic skin protector falls off and does not attach properly. I took a video to post on amazon. It looks like made in China cheap crap.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product but NOT WORTH THE PAIN!
customer_reviews.text: Listen...I gave this product 5 stars because it works exactly how it should. The different heads are nice and it’s of good quality butttt it’s not worth the pain. The first few times I did it, it left my legs riddled with bumps and the pain was pretty unbearable. I returned it. But if you’re looking for a new one and it’s something you like doing then this is great. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Better than shaving
customer_reviews.text: I hate shaving, this is a little more painful it plucks every hair out individually so yes it’s a bit painful but worth it, my hair doesn’t grow back for a while. Be careful around knees and elbows it says in the manual not to do those areas because it will pull on the skin but as long as you’re using it correctly it’s great at removing everything. I get red bumps all over where I use it but once I wash up and moisturize it clears up pretty quickly I guess depending on your skin sensitivity
customer_reviews.author: Warda

customer_reviews.title: Get something else
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as easy to use as a similar Panasonic product I bought several years ago. The attachments fall off easily, which is very annoying during hair removal. It is easy to clean and easy to hold. It easy to charge and works in both water and dry environments. It has a light to help you see where you are removing hair, but I find it annoying. I recommend going with something else.
customer_reviews.author: a reader

customer_reviews.title: Trimmer gets in the way! Cuts me:(
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing all the time...usually just the buzzer though. When I use the buzzer, the flip out trimmer ( even when it's flipped down) still seems to be able to cut. You'll be trying to buzz and the trimmer will catch your skin ( even on the flat areas) and give you a nick that hurts like a b****. it like, sucks in the skin and slices it deep at times. It does hold a charge well and the depilatory works well. But man...that trimmer kills me EVERY TIME when I buzz.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Best product to remove hair!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling to remove facial hair for years. This product has done above my expectations and is the best purchase I have made. My face feels like a baby’s arse after the hair is removed and lasts so long. I’m not embarrassed with finding facial hair the next day and I don’t feel like I have to remove the hair again. The hair is gone for weeks at a time and I’m so happy that I don’t have to worry anymore. The pain is bearable since I was using other hair removal devices and this is quick,easy to use, and the hair does not grow back by 5 pm the same day. I love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Baldassano

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, my loose skin area got stuck in the blades
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible, It had pulled my skin in the dilators blades multiple time. If you use the epilator on the area of skin where it is loose (like elbows or knees) it literally gets your skin stuck in the blades. Please don’t but it! I have no clue how people have given it good reviews. And useless attachment. I say again, it’s so costly for no reason, do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kasturi Sahasrabuddhe

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using epilator for the last 15 years.so I can definitely say this epilator worth every penny! Due to its large head I feel zero pain and the hair pulls out super fast. And it’s not noisy as others I owed
customer_reviews.author: Pearsons

customer_reviews.title: I like the light and wet/dry
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. The cover keeps popping off while using. It does a good job. I've had a couple different brands over the years. I thought this would be a major improvement but it was only an upgrade because of the light and Wet/Dry. The additional heads and number of tweezers did not make a difference over my original one.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Princess

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the pain fool you!!!
customer_reviews.text: It hurts less as you keep using it. I should've bought the one with less heads, because I personally don't use the buffer or shaver head. I sometimes use the gentle epilator head, but not very often. It doesn't take long to charge, although you can't use it while it's charging, it lasts a very long time. I prefer to use it in the shower, because it is painless in the shower along with suds. Although sometimes it doesn't take off a hair or two, I usually just have to clean it and it's fine again. I'm so happy to have found an epilator to use instead of shaving or waxing so much.
customer_reviews.author: Wynne

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Finally upgraded from my small corded epilator when the cord needed to be fixed. This thing is great! Very powerful, grabs hair quickly and with more accuracy so I don't over the same area over and over, reducing irritation. Remember, epilating gets easier and less painful with time! I barely feel it now! The extra attachments are cool but I'm sure I'll never use them, except maybe the skinny epilating head for the eyebrow area.
customer_reviews.author: PJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, but I feel like when I'm using it, I might accidentally press the power button and change speeds on accident. It holds a charge long enough to do both legs and underarms with time to spare and doesn't take long to recharge. I do feel like I have to go over some spots multiple times to get all the hairs, but the light helps in finding them. Overall pretty pleased with my first epilator.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I should sue, this epilade grabs your skin like no other I have ever used. I can't 8they haven't been sued! The tops falls off and are useless. The battery goes dead after one leg.
customer_reviews.author: joyce wald

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine until it broke.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this unit. It came with many attachments which I didn't use. The gears went bad rather quickly on this model. It was heavier than I expected. The Panasonic I had before this one lasted several years and I only had to replace it because the battery wouldn't charge anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshiko Ichikura

customer_reviews.title: Best epilator I've tried
customer_reviews.text: This is my third epilator, the most expensive one I've owned and by far the best I've used - I'm very glad I made the upgrade. It's significantly quieter than the cheaper ones, and removes hairs with fewer passes across the skin. Even doing the bikini line seems less painful too! I really like the pivoting head, that makes it so much easier, and the light is useful too.
customer_reviews.author: EmLa

customer_reviews.title: This is as good as waxing.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I don't have the time or money to have hair removed so I decided to epilate. This works great and ai can go a week or two without having to use it again. Meanwhile, I keep my skin oiled and moist with lotions. Looks great, so much better than shaving 2-3 times a week. Sometimes I epilate; then shave immediately and it keeps the legs smoother longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trash after one year
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable product. Works as stated and significantly reduces hair growth after years of usage. My first one lasted quite a few years, but then I think I have bought about two in two years. It just stops working and the battery is not replaceable. I tried to just get it replaced in an electronic’s shop. Literally, it’s electronic trash after about a year. I just now tried to return the last one and apparently the window for return is closed. I will look for a different brand now.
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA

customer_reviews.title: Great when used regularly, and helps prevent ingrown hairs
customer_reviews.text: This works great, and is easy to use and clean. You can rinse it with soap for a deeper clean or use the little brush with no problems. I use this to make leg waxing results last longer, so I save a lot of money. It hurts like heck if you don’t remove hair for a while, especially if you have thick hair, but the costs savings make it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The protection caps that are show in the manual did ...
customer_reviews.text: The protection caps that are show in the manual did NOT come with the Wet / Dry Epilator. We have the different heads but only the Gentle Cap - NOT the protection cap for legs/ arms, protection cap for under arms, protections cap for foot care head, Epilation head for underarms, epilator head for legs/arms. We would appreciate getting all the parts so that we can used the Epilator.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Hill

customer_reviews.title: This product doesn't even work anymore...and it's only been 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product at all! While this product worked very well and exceeded my expectations at first it no longer works at all! (And it has only been 4 1/2 months! And this is the 2nd product that it has happened to!) When I press the button the light turns on and that's it. I know it is charged, yet it will not work. I honestly don't know what happened, but for a product, I spend $81 on, this is absolutely ridiculous especially as I bought another one hoping it would work well. Now I have 2 of these & neither work! I would like a refund! I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mitali

customer_reviews.title: Weak gear system
customer_reviews.text: It died after occasional use. I assume it must have soft plastic gears, as it no longer moves the blades. Not the low quality I would expect from Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: Rols

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Hurts the first time you use it but then it's freaking fantastic when you don't have to shave
customer_reviews.author: Kylar johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love this epilator and shaver!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love really love this epilator and shaver!!! I don't have to shave as frequently as I did, as an aging woman I don't want to see any little hairs on any part of my face - with this I don't have to do my little touch ups as frequently. The Pedicure Buffer tool for my feet is great, when I went to get my monthly pedicure the lady gave me a compliment because my feet were 100% better and the callus buildup has not returned. Yeah!!!!! Thanks for this bundle of joyful tools! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Barnetta W. Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Works, and Ow! lol Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been struggling with hair on her face since she was a teen and I ended up just recently getting this for her. She says it's working but it can be painful but it is worth the pain to be able to feel comfortable with someone actually touching her face and not get freaked out that they will feel hair. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: It hurts really bad for the first time, but it ACTUALLY does hurt LESS AND LESS each time you use it, which makes it AMAZING! The hair grow back a bit slower too. Really like the product! Update: The callus remover is awesome as well! Makes feet so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Usmania Hamid

customer_reviews.title: Works well! ❤️ Mine
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. This is my second one. They last about two years with weeekly use. I felt the tweezer part was not working after two years. So I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st epilator I bought after a lot of research. It is really affordable and does the trick! Pulling hair out is never going to be that comfortable but this epilator does a good job of getting the hairs, which is all I ask. The light is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: How fortunate that I found this model -- its multiple functions ...
customer_reviews.text: My last Panasonic epilator lasted several years, so when I died, I searched for something by the same manufacturer. How fortunate that I found this model -- its multiple functions are a godsend. One thing I am particularly jazzed about is the pedicure attachment. Like many wearers of high heels, I develop calluses on my feet that are hard to eliminate using a pumice stone. The pedicure attachment is like a motorized pumice stone, and it is tremendously effective. Here's hoping this device last as long as its predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: Sognatrice

customer_reviews.title: The shaver is nice but the bikini trimmer will cut you if you're ...
customer_reviews.text: Epilator hurts but to be expected when ripping the hair straight out of your skin. The shaver is nice but the bikini trimmer will cut you if you're not super careful and hold it "just so."
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life and works great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical if I need buy wet and dry eppilator but I'm absolutely enjoying it. It works fast and gives clean look in no time. Cons: It doesn't work it plugged so I've to make sure that I charge it but the battery lasts long; I can easily get it to work two times (half legs - both, full arms and underarms and even smoothen feet) without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: SKJ

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with results
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure how this would work out since the number of tweezers is smaller than my previous Panasonic. Very pleased with results, especially my facial hair. I have not used a razor in 30 years and over time I see less and less hair growing back. Thank you Panasonic for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SunRae

customer_reviews.title: Like, who will
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a fan of it. Like, who will!? I always think that I am a person with higher than avg pain threshold but the epilator DOES hurt! I have only used the epilator twice. Besides the pain, the result is as expected. For those who wonder how often the epilation has to be done, it really depends on how fast your hair will grow back, aka your gene. The shaver is way more helpful to me. As far as the design, it is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have more than one epilator and this is the one I use the most. I like it is chargeable and it does not have to be plugged in. The wet or dry capability makes it great to use. Some areas hair removal is better when it’s wet with slight soap and for me that’s underarms and bikini area. I have used this weekly for months and it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Lulurxnc

customer_reviews.title: Eli-magic
customer_reviews.text: I’m an avid epilator user - I use mine daily. This is my 3rd epilator - my last 2 have lasted about 2 years apiece until they no longer would hold a charge. After looking through so many, I settled on this one and couldn’t be happier. This is he best epilator I’ve used! The dual head makes quick work of any unwanted hair with minimal pain. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Batcheller

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! It's rechargeable & comes with the different option ...
customer_reviews.text: came in original packaging. fast shipment. I bought it because I was looking for a replacement epilator. This thing is great! It's rechargeable & comes with the different option heads...I don't really use the shaver heads, only to cut the hair down, but this is a must buy. I like that you can use a drop or two of soap with the epilator and it makes for a smoother use in the shower. If you're new to epilating, it's gonna be a little painful until you get used to it. For those that are used to epilating, a definite must buy!
customer_reviews.author: April Barber

customer_reviews.title: i do think the Braun was less painful somehow. but they both rip out the hair ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used Braun Silk-epil 7 and i couldn't notice any difference between the effectiveness between the two. i do think the Braun was less painful somehow. but they both rip out the hair just as good as the other. plus, this one comes with a lot of attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use and keeps legs smooth
customer_reviews.text: Was always afraid to try epilators but I am now such a huge fan! There's a bit of pain, which is reasonable when doing arms and legs (underarms hurt too much for me though) but I think its so worth the length of time you are hairless. My arms and legs are so smooth and have been hair-free for over a week now. Totally suggest buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of ingrown hairs
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great until I started getting ingrown hairs everywhere I used it. They didn't get bad until a month and a half in to using the epilator. I tried everything I could think of and all the advice I could find but I couldn't find a way to stop the ingrown hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had an old version of this that finally died after 10+ years of use. This new model is awesome - holds a charge for a really long time (hasn’t died yet) and is super effective. The electric razor gives a great close shave and the epilator is quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: katie a

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR A WOMEN'S SHAPES
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is made for a woman's body. It is effective and very gentle. It takes under an hour to fully charge and having a cordless electric shaver is very convenient and easy to use. If comes with several different heads for different areas of the body. It also has a rough, round head that is fantastic for removing dead skin from the feet. I shall replace the heads when necessary and will purchase another when it no longer works. F. Parker
customer_reviews.author: Brookview Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version of this that stopped working after a decade or so. I bought this one and couldn't be happier! It hold a charge for DAYS. It travels well. The callous remover gives me the smoothest feet in sandal season and snowboot season. The epullator hurts less than my last because it works so fast. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like it so much that my sister also bought one. We both rave about it. It does its jobs exceedingly well. I would buy another one if this one wears out. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Kay Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Less effective than my old Braun; good and useful attachments; expensive
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure when depilators got so expensive. I lost my old Braun depilator/shaver during a move, so I bought this one as a replacement. It doesn't work as well--maybe because it's cordless. Unfortunately, I couldn't find a corded model with the attachments I wanted. My Braun used to get everything in one sweep, whereas this one requires multiple passes, which leads to irritation in places like the armpits. I have very fine hair at this point after years of depilating, though, so it may work better with people with coarser hair.
customer_reviews.author: grumpyrobot

customer_reviews.title: No skin irritation or ingrowns.
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and even shaving makes me irritated. I have never been able to shave against the grain in the more sensitive areas because it would cause me to have horrible ingrowns. Using the epilator part, I'm able to get everything smooth and it causes less iritation than shaving does. I exfoliate beforehand and hardly get any ingrowns at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kipper Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I had a Braun epilator before I got this one and loved it. Ripped out every hair but I unfortunately dropped it and it broke. This one is pretty good (I haven't used every single head though) but it's not as amazing as the one I used to have. I like it though and it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: This worked awesome! I used it the night before I left ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use in my bikini area before I went on a cruise. This worked awesome! I used it the night before I left and still have yet to have to use it for a follow up. I did use it on my chin, neck area, upper lip and have found it does an amazing job. I had no stubble as if I had a sugaring professionally. I have had no "bumps" or irritation of the skin anywhere. I feel the price was perfect for all I got and that it paid for itself with the first use. I highly recommend this item for a personal "in home" use.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: I liked it while it lasted. After a year it stopped working and I didn't use it all that much since I was pregnant during that year
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first day!
customer_reviews.text: This uses cheap nylon gears that already broke the same day! The bikini attachment head stripped out on the first use. Grrr.
customer_reviews.author: Mame Dennis-Burnside

customer_reviews.title: Most painful greatest purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does it hurt the first time? Yes... so much yes. This torture device prolongs the pain of waxing but gives you amazing results for a fraction of the price. This particular one is a great price for what you get. No need to spend $100+ to get a thousand attachments but much better than a $30 one. The wet/dry and light features are a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Linden

customer_reviews.title: Keep your skin tight!
customer_reviews.text: I've used epilators for almost 20yrs. This works really well. Just be sure to keep your skin tight! The older ones usually only had 1 rotating head. Now, they have two. If you don't hold your skin tight, it WILL get caught. It's not excruciating pain (I guess that depends on where you're epilating), but enough to pinch and draw a small amount of blood.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal/Khadijah/Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using epilators for more than 10 years, so I can say I have experience, lol. It’s the best one I’ve had so far. It works very well, removes all the hair quickly, and with very little pain! Made a big difference in my hair removal routine. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ethève

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I am going to call manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: After two charges the device stopped charging. Very disappointed. I am going to call manufacturer. The warranty should cover but always a disappointment and a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: KFDrMama

customer_reviews.title: The first time you use it feels like you are dragging a knife blade over your skin
customer_reviews.text: The first time you use it feels like you are dragging a knife blade over your skin. Imagine waxing in slow motion. Yikes. However, make it past the first attempt and it's not so bad!! Quicker, cleaner, and easier than waxing. Comes with more attachments than you probably need and a nice little pouch to hold it all in. Highly recommend, if you can stomach the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Phu Le

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older one I had. This one is SO much nicer than what I had. It works great. I also really like that it can be used to groom in the shower. The foot pumice thingie is awesome. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: My second one similar to this, my first one didn't have all the fancy attachments. Love them. The battery holds a charge for a very long time, all the attachments work perfectly, especially the foot pumice stone. Its very easy to clean and the light is very bright so you don't miss any hairs using the epilator. Highly recommend it. My favorite Christmas gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: marilyn ranata

customer_reviews.title: Great product, My wife just love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product, My wife just love it. I have a wrong shipment, but called Amazon and they fix the issue in the same day, thanks AMAZON for the great Customer Service Support. My wife recommends this product, she said it works as described, she said it was painful the first time she use it, but she hasn't realized that she has to start with the beginners blade, so please read the instructions first.. hehehehehe When she used the right one, she said that it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Picado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using epilators for years but it is definitely an upgrade! Less pain, working better, I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gaëlle

customer_reviews.title: My little all in one shaver
customer_reviews.text: My old one just stopped working . This has all the attachment in one so it is great . Love the ease of use
customer_reviews.author: Debra Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I have some trouble with the skinny head catching hair. The larger head works much better. On more sensitive areas, it's pretty painful at first, but you just have to be brave, suck it up, and keep on trucking. Eventually it won't hurt anymore. In the long run, you'll save a ton of money on shaving equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Kadie Peters

customer_reviews.title: Quality product long lasting charge
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it’s just awesome! It’s lovely not to cut my legs up anymore! Charge lasts forever and the light feature is just great! Totally pleased with this product. I have recommended it to all my girlfriends!
customer_reviews.author: The Warrior TLB

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it once but it worked very well. Took a minute to get used to how fast you should go but it was not extremely painful and the results were good. After the first use my skin was smooth, no hair even started to grow back for over a week!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah I

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it, unless you're a sissy!
customer_reviews.text: Ouch! But wow! I'm crazy busy, so by the time I shave, I'm hairy again. This gives me a greater window of smooth and is way cheaper than waxing. I was nervous about taking the plunge but am so glad I did. Using shower gel as directed makes it easier. I would assimilate the pain to getting a tattoo, hurts at first but then goes numb. Armpits are the worst but I sure love knowing they are smooth after a week!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed, how are we suppose to get hair removed of the legs if we can only use it on the bottom part of the legs. I bought something that doesn’t work all way. They should put it on the box, not on the instructions only. If it’s meant for half the leg, put a photo on the back of the box. Now I have wasted money and have to buy something that can do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Gisele miller

customer_reviews.title: Guard keeps falling off on contour areas.
customer_reviews.text: The epilator works on legs. On underarms the guard kept falling off. So not good on areas with contours. Once it grabbed my skin and wouldn’t let go till I shut it off. Trying a different unit. Returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper for life.

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement for brazillian waxing during quarantine, but this turned out to be a little too uncomfortable to use. For leg usage, it takes a little longer then just shaving, but definitely less mess then trying to wax your own legs.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Roots

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Epilator!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I don't find that the sensitive head works well- maybe my hair doesn't stand up enough. The others are stellar. I do use the gentle attachment for the standard sized epilator head. The shaver/bikini trimmer is excellent. Please don't expect it to feel good. It is ripping hair out by the roots. It stings. Witch hazel applied afterwards seems to help the red spots on my skin afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Smelly SmingsleyTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy cleaning, can be scary for first time!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well! I use it dry, and mostly on my legs and under arms. The most pain I get Is from sensitive areas, such as my under arms and higher on my thighs. It is easy to clean and keeps the charge well. It can be a little loud but I just turn on a Netflix show or Youtube video, sit down and just go for it (underarms take a little longer and some slow breathing but it is do-able!). I suggest for anyone with a low pain tolerance take some ibuprofen 20mins before you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: died so quickly
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if this what they are doing to make more money, but I have been buying them for almost 8 years now and they usually last me a year, and thats ok. The last three died within 4 months, and I haven't changed my routine so I don't know why this would happen other than it being completely frustrating to me. I am going to start looking for a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first two times I used it. Now it won't hold a charge. It stays charged for less then five minutes and seems very sluggish the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the pain
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Painful, but that’s to be expected since you are ripping your hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Gentle gliding it on face, chin, everywhere you use it
customer_reviews.text: Using product on my face, chin and it works really well. If you are going to use it there as well. Gentle gliding it over the hair. You will damage your skin and be painful. Make sure hairs are a little longer then you would like to have on your face. It has kept the hair off for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Will never shave again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, clean, results last weeks. Can be painful at first, but over time the pain lessens along with the hair regrowth
customer_reviews.author: Shayna

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I said fun. I enjoyed the multiple tools more than I thought I would for sure. I can make the process more gentle or faster for different areas, and the shaving feature is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Just get laser hair removal
customer_reviews.text: If you only want to do your armpits, then this would work. However, after each use (and cleaning it in between uses appropriately) I've continued to get irritated pumps and pimple-looking bumps on my legs after using this! They are reddened and hurt. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Younker

customer_reviews.title: Best epilator ever!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down - this epilator is the best! It only took me 30 minutes to clean my legs and the result was silky soft skin without the usual bumps. The bikini attachment also pulls out the hair like its nothing. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: katq73

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. At first it pinches just a bit but you get used to it. My underarm hair and leg hair stays gone for at least 2 weeks! Love all of the different attachments!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Conner

customer_reviews.title: Ouch but Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing. She says it's really painful but that it's getting easier and everything we've read online says that the pain will get less and less over time. She says that she's already starting to see that he armpit hair isn't growing back in at all in some places (she read that with repeated use eventually you wont need the epilator at all for certain spots).
customer_reviews.author: RideTheSpiralToTheEnd

product_meta.title: Panasonic ES-ED90-P Wet/Dry Epilator and Shaver, with Six Attachments including Pedicure Buffer for Foot Care, Red
product_meta.description: Style:6 AttachmentsA convenient, time-saving alternative to the time and cost of waxing, the Panasonic ES-ED90-P hair remover system is a shaver, epilator and pedicure buffer in one for complete at-home hair removal for women. It includes six snap-on attachment heads for safe, unwanted hair removal on arms, legs, underarms and bikini areas plus an added pedicure buffer attachment for foot care. A high-performance, dual-speed motor drive makes the hair removal process more comfortable and personalized. The Shaver Head smoothly lifts, holds and cuts hair at the base with stainless-steel, hypo-allergenic blades and foil for added protection on sensitive skin, and a built-in pop-up trimmer captures long or stray hairs anywhere on the body and shapes the bikini area. The Panasonic epilator’s Bikini Comb attachment quickly snaps on to the shaver head to neatly and gently trim the bikini area. The dual-disc Epilator Head pivots 30° forward, 30° backwards to conform more naturally to individual body contours. Inside, 48 precision rotary tweezers provide wider skin coverage, ideal for hair removal on legs and arms. A compact Gentle Epilator Head cleanly and safely removes hair from softer, more sensitive areas like underarms and bikini areas, and you can snap on the Gentle Epilator Cap to lift and remove thinner, shorter hairs without irritation. For the feet, a Pedicure Buffer cleanly removes dry, callous skin. The Panasonic ES-ED90-P women’s electric shaver and epilator also includes a built-in LED light to reveal hard-to-see hairs for thorough shaving and epilation. This versatile shaver/epilator is wet dry convenient and can be used in the bath or shower with foam or gel, or used dry anytime. Cleanup is quick and simple. Just rinse Panasonic epilator under warm running water. For travel, an included travel pouch holds shaver/epilator and attachments. To help maintain the level of comfort and satisfaction you demand from your Panasonic Shaver and Epilator hair removal system, the high-performance inner blade and outer foil should be replaced once every one to two years with genuine, easy-to-install Panasonic replacement accessories: Outer Foil (WES9753P), Inner Blade (WES9752P), Outer Foil/Inner Blade Combo (WES9759P).
feature_bullets: Panasonic’s multi-functional women's electric razor and epilator with high-performance dual-speed motor and 6 Snap-On hair remover and pedicure buffer attachments for complete hair removal and foot care at home

The Panasonic epilator includes a shaver head with hypo-allergenic blades and foil for safe hair removal on sensitive skin and a pop-up trimmer to capture long and stray hairs and trim, shape and maintain the bikini area

Wide, dual-disc Epilation Head hair remover conforms to individual body contours, ideal for legs and arms, Gentle Epilator Head takes care of hair removal from sensitive areas. Power source- AC 100-240 volt. Charging time 1 hour. Operating time 30 minutes
Panasonic epilator includes a pedicure buffer attachment to gently remove dry, rough skin and beautify feet. Compatible with-outer foil with inner blade combo, inner blade

Wet dry convenient hair removal, use dry anytime or in bath or shower; Panasonic shaver/epilator cleans quickly and easily under warm running water; Built-in LED light and travel pouch included. Use on hair approximately 2 to 3 mm long approximately 1/8 inch

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
